OOC: Would now be a good time to point out that Aerotaur's still inside.  He 
only turned on the autocannons.  Thus he can't be shot at unless your 
characters attack the shields first.  Now you can either repost or you can 
treat it as though those shots hit the shields.  The only Chivtron that is 
outside right now is Windlord.

--part1_65.20e811eb.29733662_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
